author: ET CONTRIBUTORS
title: How India can save lives and livelihoods
description: How India can save lives and livelihoods If the virus were contained by the current lockdown, India’s GDP may grow 1-2% in FY2021.
content: By Anu Madgavkar & Rajat GuptaThe Covid-19 pandemic is the greatest health and humanitarian challenge the world has faced since World War 2. In response, India has moved quickly to implement a nationwide, 21-day lockdown, with a view to flattening the cur… [+5706 chars]
